name: The Same World OL
description:
◆Between sky and land, I only need you by my side.
◆No matter black or white, Love is the light of my life.

◆Was wrong or right? so far away and so close.

◆I'm afraid words can't describe your dissipated face.

◆Living with loneliness in the same world.

◆This is the sound from another world, Under Rebirth, What kind of story in there?

◆Story mode, Past life and Present life, Walking in the clouds, We invite you together！

◆Classic puzzle Indie game"the same world " Online version, Edit levels, Wonderful story, Write poetry.

◆Everyone can experience the fun of editing levels.

◆The classic gameplay reappears and the beautiful story continues. You can play any mode, It's all in "the same world OL ".

◆The previous version has more than 10 million downloads, Recommended by App store, App Store Boutique Chinese Indie game .

◆Another world, Past life and Present life, Walking in the clouds, We invite you together！
